channel.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
channel.description: i'm wondering if repeated killing is allowed because i was at my house when tom5001 repeatedly kept on killing me over and over agean in my own house and out side when i tried to escape. i'm wondering if this is allowed because i'm getting tired of it :confused: if it isint ill post this on the infractions, if it isint ill do the same to him, have a nice day moparcraft staff :D

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @piggle piggle
item.description:
@piggle wrote:

okay, this has been settled, me and tom are fine now. im going to close this thread now

g’day

Read full topic

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m happy to start a war with you, I mean that’s the point of the game (for me)

In my opinion, this makes it funner. There really is no need to be angry about being beaten. I’m sure you’ll defeat me in a few battles. May the best Moparcraft player win, I guess? I also know you’re posting this because you don’t like PVP, me, or my friend. There are many people I don’t like in this world, but that doesn’t mean I try to get at them.

Read full topic

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @piggle piggle
item.description:
@piggle wrote:

sigh i wasint 100 block from my house and i didint come at you, you started attacking me for no reason, the reason i left my house was to get away from you and your pet, yea, a pet, you command him and keep him on a leash, tom its $%@^ing on, i swear to god i will kill you if you step a single block away from your little hide hole, i will raid you, im tired of this $@%^, you can do this and lie, ill make myslef anouther trotrotro if this isint settled, unless you want to settle this, but yea, i know the tricks of the trade.
have a nice day

Read full topic

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Oh, 100 blocks if fine.
Raiding would be better if everyone was like, 500 blocks from eachother, and and some sort of faction mod was implace, just to keep balance.

Read full topic

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

No it’s not. And I didn’t even do that, you where in your little sand garden a good 100 blocks from your house, the only times we killed you where when you came at us. Why can’t you just accept you’re bound to loose at some point?

Raiding on this server isn’t even fun anymore, people just over react and warp it into something else. Though if you have proof of me breaking the rules (as always) feel free to post it. I’m a very PVP based person.

basically: I killed you WAY outside your house.

You’ve moved into a very PVP competitive area, if you find this bad then I suggest you move. Because a lot more people will try to raid you.

Read full topic

item.title: Is repeditly killing allowed?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Counts as spawn camping, however, you have no pictures, so we’re not allowed to do anything.
Technically yes, it is against the rules.

Read full topic
